credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
title: Design for Wall Decoration, Yellow (North) Drawing Room
medium: Watercolor over graphite on white wove paper
description:
Horizontal rectangle. Design for the Royal Pavilion, Brighton. Elevation of wall similar to 1948-40-18, though not as complete. The two Chinese paintings at left are blank, the lower section of the wall is not included, nor is the section of the molding.

Original album associated with this collection still exists.  See 1948-40-1 accessory
name: Drawing
